docs.title: A Software Engineer's Field Guide
docs.text:
Welcome to a curated collection of notes, guides, and best practices for modern software engineering. This guide serves as a personal knowledge base and a quick reference for common tools and concepts.

Site URL: https://wulfnb.github.io/software_engineer/ Repo URL: https://github.com/wulfnb/software_engineer

docs.title: 1. 🧠 Core Programming
docs.text:
Goal: Cover fundamentals every engineer should master.

Languages

Python: syntax, OOP, virtualenv, pip, small scripts

Java: setup, Maven/Gradle, OOP, streams, collections

JavaScript: ES6+, async/await, modules

TypeScript: types, interfaces, config setup

C# or Go: (optional advanced languages)

Design Patterns

Creational, Structural, Behavioral

Examples in Java & Python

Data Structures & Algorithms

Lists, Trees, Graphs, Hash Maps

Sorting, Searching

Complexity basics (Big O notation)
